text.content: Streamline your back office operations with our powerful software solution.

heroSection.heading1: Take back office to next level
heroSection.heading2: boNeeds is the backbone of any business, playing an integral role in a businessâ€™ ability to operate, grow & develop.
heroSection.heading3: Let you focus on your business than managing vendors, users, projects, invoice manually.

featuresSection.title: Detailed Reporting
featuresSection.description: Place to get all the detailed reporting about revenue, profit, performance by account, vendor, project and by resource.

featuresSection.title: Manage Vendors
featuresSection.description: Know when and how your projects are going so you can stay on top of all the dates and its revenue.

featuresSection.title: Manage projects
featuresSection.description: You don't have to hunt your email inbox to find that one conversation. Every task, project, and vendor information is just a click away.

featuresSection.title: Manage invoices
featuresSection.description: You don't have to deal with multiple portals or paper traces to manage invoices and payment, can do everything in one place without going out of page.

featuresSection.title: Time and Expense entry
featuresSection.description: Manage your and your team time and expenses, Enable workflow to approve your expenses and track the payments.

cards.title: Design Projects 1
cards.text: The project board is an exclusive resource for contract work. It's perfect for freelancers, agencies, and moonlighters.

data.heading: Highlights
data.detail: These are just a few of the many features that are highlighted.

featureCards.heading: Clients
descriptions: Create profiles for each client, including contact information, communication history, notes, and more
Store and manage contracts with clients, including terms, expiration dates, and renewals

featureCards.heading: Projects
descriptions: Our project management software includes resource management tools, allowing users to assign resources, such as people and equipment, to specific tasks or projects.
Includes budget tracking tools, allowing users to monitor project costs and ensure that they stay within budget.
Includes reporting and analytics tools, allowing users to generate reports and analyze project data.

featureCards.heading: Users (Contractor/Emplyees)
descriptions: Ease the on-boarding process.
Manage all the documents related to a user
Role based access to only the modules appropriate for users
Add and track all the comments for all the objects within the platform.

featureCards.heading: Timesheet
descriptions: Includes approval workflows, allowing managers to review and approve timesheets before they are submitted for invoices.
Enable to track both the billable and non-billable time within organization/project
Enforce certain rules and budget while user enters the timesheet.

featureCards.heading: Expense
descriptions: Includes receipt capture tools, allowing users to take pictures of receipts and attach them to expense reports, reducing paper waste and streamlining the process.
Includes approval workflows, allowing managers to review and approve expenses before they are reimbursed.

featureCards.heading: Payments
descriptions: All admins to pay the invoice from our platform not to go into their banking portal.
Enables to pull the bank transactions and create expense entries just just selecting each transactions.
Integrated with payment procesor to do the ACH transfers,

featureCards.heading: Automated workflows
descriptions: Streamlines your business processes with automated workflows, reducing manual effort and increasing efficiency.
Collaborate and communicate with your team in a productive and efficient environment.

featureCards.heading: Dashboard
descriptions: Get a quick overview of your business operations with dashboards that display relevant information in real-time.
Only related information based on logged in personas with highlighted graphs.

featureCards.heading: eSignatures
descriptions: eSignatures from clients, vendors, or employees, allowing you to get documents signed quickly and efficiently using DocuSign intgration.
Create customizable document templates for common contracts or forms, streamlining the signature process and saving time.

featureCards.heading: Import & Export Data
descriptions: Our import and export feature makes it easy to transfer data from one system to another, saving time and reducing errors.
Our import & export feature allows for scheduled imports/exports, so that data can be imported/exported automatically at regular intervals.

featureCards.heading: Reminders
descriptions: Our reminder feature offers users to enable anytime to remind on their timesheet/exponse/invoice submittal, approval etc.,
Send invoice reminder email promptly before the due date.

featureCards.heading: Reports
descriptions: Our reports help you understand your data and make informed business decisions
Reports can be scheduled to goto your executives on regular intervals.
Enable to generate reports at Clients, Project, User and Accoint level

data.heading1: Say Goodbye to Tedious Tasks with Our Streamlined
data.description1: Simplify Your Processes and Save Time. Maximize Your Efficiency with Our User-Friendly Back Office Solution. Automate Your Workflow and Boost Productivity with Our Software

mainContent.heading: Overview
paraDetails: boNeeds is a type of business software that is designed to streamline and automate administrative tasks and processes that are essential to running a company, but do not directly generate revenue. These tasks may include managing clients, project, contracts, timesheets, expenses, invoices, customer data, and operations.

The goal of boNeeds is to improve efficiency and productivity by automating repetitive tasks and eliminating manual data entry, reducing the risk of errors and freeing up time for employees to focus on higher-level tasks. This software can help businesses to manage large amounts of data, maintain accurate records, and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.

boNeeds includes a range of modules that are designed to address specific business needs, such as clients, users, projects, timesheets, expense, supplier costs, and customer relationship management (CRM). Also include features for project management, collaboration, and communication, allowing teams to work together more effectively using the workflow management, document management, reminders and schedulers.

mainContent.heading: About boNeeds
paraDetails: Welcome to boNeeds, a software company dedicated to helping businesses streamline their back office operations.

At boNeeds, we understand the challenges that come with managing complex business processes, from financial reporting to inventory management. Our mission is to make those tasks easier, more efficient, and more cost-effective through our innovative platform.

Our team consists of experienced professionals who are passionate about creating software that simplifies business operations. We work tirelessly to develop cutting-edge tools that provide real-time insights and automation, allowing businesses to focus on growth and customer satisfaction.

We pride ourselves on our commitment to customer service, ensuring that our clients receive the support they need to optimize their software usage. Our solutions are tailored to meet the unique needs of each business, and we are constantly evolving and improving our software to stay ahead of the curve.

At boNeeds, we believe that technology can make a real difference in the success of a business, and we are dedicated to providing the best software solutions to our clients. Contact us today to learn more about our products and how we can help your business achieve its goals.
